argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | invfval.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | invfval.n | |- N = ( Inv ` C ) |
| 3 |  | invfval.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | invfval.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | invfval.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 6 |  | isoval.n | |- I = ( Iso ` C ) |
| 7 |  | #P_isofval | |- ( C e. Cat -> ( Iso ` C ) = ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) o. ( Inv ` C ) ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( Iso ` C ) = ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) o. ( Inv ` C ) ) ) |
| 9 | 2 | #P_coeq2i | |- ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) o. N ) = ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) o. ( Inv ` C ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 6, 9 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ph -> I = ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) o. N ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_oveqd | |- ( ph -> ( X I Y ) = ( X ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) o. N ) Y ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( ( x ( Sect ` C ) y ) i^i `' ( y ( Sect ` C ) x ) ) ) = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( ( x ( Sect ` C ) y ) i^i `' ( y ( Sect ` C ) x ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( x ( Sect ` C ) y ) e. _V |
| 14 | 13 | #P_inex1 | |- ( ( x ( Sect ` C ) y ) i^i `' ( y ( Sect ` C ) x ) ) e. _V |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_fnmpt2i | |- ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( ( x ( Sect ` C ) y ) i^i `' ( y ( Sect ` C ) x ) ) ) Fn ( B X. B ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Sect ` C ) = ( Sect ` C ) |
| 17 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 16 | #P_invffval | |- ( ph -> N = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( ( x ( Sect ` C ) y ) i^i `' ( y ( Sect ` C ) x ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_fneq1d | |- ( ph -> ( N Fn ( B X. B ) <-> ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( ( x ( Sect ` C ) y ) i^i `' ( y ( Sect ` C ) x ) ) ) Fn ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 19 | 15, 18 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( ph -> N Fn ( B X. B ) ) |
| 20 |  | #P_opelxpi | |- ( ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> <. X , Y >. e. ( B X. B ) ) |
| 21 | 4, 5, 20 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> <. X , Y >. e. ( B X. B ) ) |
| 22 |  | #P_fvco2 | |- ( ( N Fn ( B X. B ) /\ <. X , Y >. e. ( B X. B ) ) -> ( ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) o. N ) ` <. X , Y >. ) = ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) ` ( N ` <. X , Y >. ) ) ) |
| 23 | 19, 21, 22 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) o. N ) ` <. X , Y >. ) = ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) ` ( N ` <. X , Y >. ) ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_df-ov | |- ( X ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) o. N ) Y ) = ( ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) o. N ) ` <. X , Y >. ) |
| 25 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( X N Y ) e. _V |
| 26 |  | #P_dmeq | |- ( z = ( X N Y ) -> dom z = dom ( X N Y ) ) |
| 27 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) = ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) |
| 28 | 25 | #P_dmex | |- dom ( X N Y ) e. _V |
| 29 | 26, 27, 28 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( ( X N Y ) e. _V -> ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) ` ( X N Y ) ) = dom ( X N Y ) ) |
| 30 | 25, 29 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) ` ( X N Y ) ) = dom ( X N Y ) |
| 31 |  | #P_df-ov | |- ( X N Y ) = ( N ` <. X , Y >. ) |
| 32 | 31 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) ` ( X N Y ) ) = ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) ` ( N ` <. X , Y >. ) ) |
| 33 | 30, 32 | #P_eqtr3i | |- dom ( X N Y ) = ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) ` ( N ` <. X , Y >. ) ) |
| 34 | 23, 24, 33 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ph -> ( X ( ( z e. _V |-> dom z ) o. N ) Y ) = dom ( X N Y ) ) |
| 35 | 11, 34 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( X I Y ) = dom ( X N Y ) ) |
